Swan Lake: Quest for the Kingdoms is an upcoming American animated superhero film from a script written by Kourtney Kang, based on their graphic novel of the same name by Rex Ogle & Megan Kearney.
Plot
Princesses Odette and Dillie grew up in feuding kingdoms since birth, but when they realize that Odette is cursed because of the tension between their families, they decide to travel to someone who can set everything right.
Production
Development
On June 10, 2024, Paramount Animation announced the animated feature film adaptation of Rex Ogle & Megan Kearneyâ€™s graphic novel Swan Lake: Quest for the Kingdoms with Kourtney Kang writing the screenplay with Temple Hill Entertainment producing the film.
